item.description:
[/b] Original song arranging & jamming.[/b] Rehearsal of songs for performance. Generally, newcomers, beginners,  intermediates and free style jamming starts at 2PM, and Rehearsal for Open mikes, shows around 2:30. Bring music sheets of your songs if possible. All musician levels welcome & encouraged. Lessons in theory or practice, music genres, or jamming if appropriate. [i]Directions will be emailed to attendees the night before or morning (by 10AM) of the meetup[/i].

We are playing in a restaurant so if people arrive we need to play well and not too loud.  Try to bring an acoustic if you can.
item.how_to_find_us: A couple of blocks west on Mass Ave from Porter Sq across from the Elephant Walk. On the corner of Mass Ave & Walden St.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Jam / Music Rehearsal
